intro: Bulleyia yunnanensis, commonly known as Yunnan bulleyia, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Apiaceae family, which includes carrots and parsley, and is characterized by its aromatic foliage. The plant produces small, yellowish flowers arranged in umbels, typical of the family. It thrives in moist, temperate climates and is often found in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and lesser-known species within its native habitat.
